snippet: The N.H.L. competition committee recommended that visors be mandated for players entering the league next season.
abstract: NHL competition committee recommends that visors be mandated for players entering league in 2013-2014 season; under the plan, any player who has appeared in more than 26 NHL games would be allowed to play without a visor.
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. competition committee recommended that visors be mandated for players entering the league next season.
